title: BeaconNode tests failing on master
body:
Run dotnet test -c Release src/Nethermind/Nethermind.BeaconNode.Test
BeaconBlocks/Ssz.BeaconBlockBody.cs(99,52): warning CS8619: Nullability of reference types in value of type 'ProposerSlashing?[]' doesn't match target type 'ProposerSlashing[]'. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
BeaconBlocks/Ssz.BeaconBlockBody.cs(100,52): warning CS8619: Nullability of reference types in value of type 'AttesterSlashing?[]' doesn't match target type 'AttesterSlashing[]'. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
BeaconBlocks/Ssz.BeaconBlockBody.cs(101,42): warning CS8619: Nullability of reference types in value of type 'Attestation?[]' doesn't match target type 'Attestation[]'. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
BeaconBlocks/Ssz.BeaconBlockBody.cs(103,46): warning CS8619: Nullability of reference types in value of type 'VoluntaryExit?[]' doesn't match target type 'VoluntaryExit[]'. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
BeaconOperations/Ssz.Deposit.cs(63,33): warning CS8601: Possible null reference assignment. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
MiscDependencies/Ssz.Eth1Data.cs(63,17): warning CS8604: Possible null reference argument for parameter 'left' in 'bool Eth1Data.operator ==(Eth1Data left, Eth1Data right)'. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
MiscDependencies/Ssz.Eth1Data.cs(63,30): warning CS8625: Cannot convert null literal to non-nullable reference type. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
Ssz.BeaconState.cs(218,17): warning CS8620: Argument of type 'PendingAttestation?[]' cannot be used for parameter 'previousEpochAttestations' of type 'IList<PendingAttestation>' in 'BeaconState.BeaconState(ulong genesisTime, Slot slot, Fork fork, BeaconBlockHeader latestBlockHeader, Hash32[] blockRoots, Hash32[] stateRoots, IList<Hash32> historicalRoots, Eth1Data eth1Data, IList<Eth1Data> eth1DataVotes, ulong eth1DepositIndex, IList<Validator> validators, IList<Gwei> balances, Hash32[] randaoMixes, Gwei[] slashings, IList<PendingAttestation> previousEpochAttestations, IList<PendingAttestation> currentEpochAttestations, BitArray justificationBits, Checkpoint previousJustifiedCheckpoint, Checkpoint currentJustifiedCheckpoint, Checkpoint finalizedCheckpoint)' due to differences in the nullability of reference types. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]
Ssz.BeaconState.cs(219,17): warning CS8620: Argument of type 'PendingAttestation?[]' cannot be used for parameter 'currentEpochAttestations' of type 'IList<PendingAttestation>' in 'BeaconState.BeaconState(ulong genesisTime, Slot slot, Fork fork, BeaconBlockHeader latestBlockHeader, Hash32[] blockRoots, Hash32[] stateRoots, IList<Hash32> historicalRoots, Eth1Data eth1Data, IList<Eth1Data> eth1DataVotes, ulong eth1DepositIndex, IList<Validator> validators, IList<Gwei> balances, Hash32[] randaoMixes, Gwei[] slashings, IList<PendingAttestation> previousEpochAttestations, IList<PendingAttestation> currentEpochAttestations, BitArray justificationBits, Checkpoint previousJustifiedCheckpoint, Checkpoint currentJustifiedCheckpoint, Checkpoint finalizedCheckpoint)' due to differences in the nullability of reference types. [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Ssz/Nethermind.Ssz.csproj]

/Users/runner/.nuget/packages/gitversiontask/5.1.3/build/GitVersionTask.targets(10,9): error :    at LibGit2Sharp.Core.Ensure.HandleError(Int32 result) [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.BeaconNode/Nethermind.BeaconNode.csproj]
/Users/runner/.nuget/packages/gitversiontask/5.1.3/build/GitVersionTask.targets(10,9): error :    at LibGit2Sharp.Core.Ensure.ZeroResult(Int32 result) [/Users/runner/runners/2.163.1/work/***/***/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.BeaconNode/Nethermind.BeaconNode.csproj]
